title: Nicolas Sarkozy faces formal investigation
text:
Nicolas Sarkozy faces formal investigation 12:55pm GMT - 00:52 
Former French president Nicolas Sarkozy is being formally investigated over allegations he received campaign funding from the late Libyan leader Muammar Gaddafi.   
Former French president Nicolas Sarkozy is being formally investigated over allegations he received campaign funding from the late Libyan leader Muammar Gaddafi.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/03/22/nicolas-sarkozy-faces-formal-investigati?videoId=411138143&videoChannel=13422
